channel.title: CVE Feed for SendPress -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SendPress -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-41729|2024-08-02T19:01:35.550Z -- sendpress -- sendpress%20newsletters
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SendPress Newsletters plugin <= 1.22.3.31 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-41730|2024-08-02T19:01:35.433Z -- sendpress -- sendpress%20newsletters
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SendPress Newsletters plugin <= 1.22.3.31 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-47517|2024-08-02T21:09:36.990Z -- sendpress -- sendpress%20newsletters
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SendPress Newsletters plugin <= 1.23.11.6 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-35040|2024-08-02T16:17:04.505Z -- sendpress -- sendpress%20newsletters
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in SendPress SendPress Newsletters.This issue affects SendPress Newsletters: from n/a through 1.23.11.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-35040|2024-07-12T20:25:43.431Z -- sendpress -- sendpress%20newsletters
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in SendPress SendPress Newsletters.This issue affects SendPress Newsletters: from n/a through 1.23.11.6.
